title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 4 categories on the x axis representing Device, and Number of visits in each Device on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Smartphone where Number of visits is 17.7.
The lowest category is found at Tablet where Number of visits is 1.2.
The highest value at Smartphone is almost 14.75 times larger than the minimum value of Tablet.
The highest value at Smartphone is almost 14.75 times larger than the minimum value of Tablet.
The difference between the max Device Smartphone and min Device Tablet is 16.5.
